I needed the same thing and looked at the junit ext project=85 but found th=
eir
implementation a little =93weird=94.



So in my free time, I implement=
ed a configurable test filter based on system
properties.  It can be found =
at http://github.com/bigmikef/junit-addons/.



It is just one class, and i=
s really well documented.  The class name is
org.junitAddOn.runners.SystemP=
ropertyFilteredRunner.  It is located in the
src/java directory.


Big Mike=
